member.name: M:RozWorld_API.Container.Inventory.AddItem(RozWorld_API.Thing.Item,System.UInt16,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds an item to this inventory
member.param: The item to add.
The quantity of the item to add.
Whether to carry over the item if the quantity overloads the maximum per slot.
The slot to attempt to add the item to, an invalid or occupied value will result in the item being added to the first available slot.
member.returns: Any leftovers that did not fit inside this inventory as an item stack, or null if successful.

member.name: M:RozWorld_API.Container.Inventory.AddItemSlot(RozWorld_API.Container.ItemSlot,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds an item slot to this inventory.
member.param: The item slot to add.
Whether to carry over the item if the quantity overloads the maximum per slot.
The slot to attempt to add the item slot into, an invalid or occupied value will result in the item being added to the first available slot.
member.returns: Any leftovers that did not fit inside this inventory as an item stack, or null if successful.

member.summary: Generates a new chunk for a given world at the specified location.
member.param: The parent world of this chunk.
The x-coordinate of where to generate this chunk.
The y-coordinate of where to generate this chunk.
The z-coordinate of where to generate this chunk.
The instructions given to this chunk from surrounding chunks.
The arguments to pass to this generator.
member.returns: The chunk that was just generated for the world
